title: Singularity
description: Jonathan Knox's knack for intuiting hidden relationships among seemingly isolated events serves his Fortune-500 clients well, but when federal agent Marianna Bonaventure blackmails him into helping her, Knox's talent is put to the ultimate test. Bonaventure is investigating a Russian industrialist suspected of trading in WMD research, but together they uncover something far more an attempt to capture a microscopic black hole and harness its awesome power to transform the world -- or end it!
author: Bill DeSmedt
